content: > this classic lace blanket is an heirloom that will be cherished for years to come *lion brand yarn* blanket is worked in one piece from corner to corner all 3 versions of this blanket use the same pattern instruction gauge & make the same size the blanket the recommended needle size & yarn are the only difference check gauge with the yarn you choose if blanket size is important to you l10157 diagonal eyelet baby blanket 1 2011 martha stewart craftstm/mc merino article #5300 5 balls circular knitting needles 29 inches size 9 90485 treasured heirloom baby blanket 3 2017 lb collection® cashmere article #483 6 balls circular knitting needles size 8 5 mm 29 in 73 5 cm long l70252 diagonal eyelet baby afghan 4 2018 vanna s choice 4 skeins circular knitting needles size 8 5 mm 29 in 73 5 cm long 1 https //www lionbrand com/products/knitting-pattern-diagonal-eyelet-baby-blanket-1 3 https //www lionbrand com/products/knitting-pattern-treasured-heirloom-baby-blanket-1 4 https //www lionbrand com/products/diagonal-eyelet-baby-afghan-l70252
